title: LOCATION OF BATTERIES
fullText:
All batteries shall be located in an area that shall be designed to prevent access by unauthorized persons.
Batteries shall be installed in one of the following:
(a) A dedicated equipment room or battery enclosure; or
NOTE: See Clause 7.3 and the examples in Appendix C
(b) A fenced off section in a larger room where the room does not have restricted access, for example part of a larger shed (see Clause 7.4).
NOTE: Item (a) is the preferred option.
